author: trenton9

text: I was about 11 when this game came out. I remember the first town with the cannibals, and how it used to scare the hell out of me when the town became possessed. Then after beating the boss the town would go back to normal and this song would start playing. Gave me such a safe, happy, warm feeling inside and this song still does everytime I listen 11 years on.

author: AM El Madani

text: I hail from a poor village in Vietnam,a land of mysteries and legends of the deceased. In the old times,us children and our fathers used to go pass a large graveyard every night to catch fishes from a large pond outside of our village. We had to put in our mouths some kind of seal so some of the vengeful spirits of our ancestors wouldn't drag us to the underworld. This song really brings me back to those nights with the moon zither tune..

author: DatLine

text:
Eh...to those talking badly about SH; From the New World, it definitely was a "real 3rd one." It had the best soundtrack, too. 

Anyway, future installments in the Shadow Hearts series seems unlikely, since Nautilus, the developers, were sold off from Aruze, the Japanese developers, and split up. A large amount of them, though, joined up with Mistwalker and recently developed Lost Odyssey on the Xbox 360.
